titleStmt.title: The best gift, or God's call upon young men for their hearts Delivered in a sermon to young men. By Thomas Vincent, minister sometime of Maudlins Milkstreet, London.
titleStmt.author: Vincent, Thomas, 1634-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for George Calvert and Samuel Sprint, and are to be sold at the Golden Ball in Duck Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.

place.placeName: the Golden Ball in Duck Lane
